summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Bizdesk365 MVP - all backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly. French UI, multi-tenant architecture, and JWT authentication fully functional.
passed_tests: All 15 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Login page loads with French UI and pre-filled demo credentials
Authentication flow works correctly with JWT tokens
Dashboard home displays all KPI cards with real data
Navigation to Compliance page shows maturity score and circular chart
Navigation to Enterprise Brain page shows IQI score and document table
Navigation to AI Governance page shows usage percentages and critical actions
Navigation to Settings page shows ISO toggles and AI policy configuration
Power Platform page correctly shows 'coming soon' status (module disabled)
Logout functionality works and redirects to login page
All data integration between frontend and backend working correctly
French localization implemented throughout the UI
Responsive design and proper styling with Tailwind CSS
All CRUD operations for settings (ISO profiles, AI policy) functional
